name: Magic Merge - Best Evolution
description:
Welcome to Magic Merge - a relaxing merge evolution game.

- Join a young sorceress on a journey to become the most powerful spellcaster
- Merge Magic Gems to increase your Spell power
- Tap to summon more gems and speed up casting spells
- Unlock new types of Magic Gems by merging them
- Observe how your Sorceress' Rank increases as she conquers new enemies and Bosses
- Complete Levels and unlock new mysterious areas
- Collect gold and spend it in the shop to increase your gem collection
- Merge Magic Gems, relax and have fun!
